_sText:
mg_ahuntepicminis_beta
Map created by Ahunt Maps. http://gamebanana.com/members/426718

Special thanks goes to Devieus from gamebanana for making the ball model used in foosball.
http://gamebanana.com/members/1088541


This map took me several weeks to complete to its beta phase, so I hope you enjoy playing it as much as I have enjoyed creating it. Please report any bugs to my gamebanana page, in the comments under this map. 
This map includes 6 mini games, not as mny as your average mini game map but its sure to be one of the
most fun maps, that I have created at least. Players must race through Frogger to get to the room 
where you can choose the mini game.

Mini games included in this map are...

Knife Fight

The setting is in a Mortal Kombat arena, with sounds and overlays that I have recreated, anyone
who has played Mortal Kombat on the NES will recognize these little features. If you are waiting to fight
and want to see the action just walk to the either side of the ring and you will get a ring side view of
what's going on inside the ring. just simply walk away to exit the ring side view.

Duck Hunt

EVERYONE should know what this is based off of, if not then your just too young. Players must shoot the
opposite teams ducks to win. Each duck you kill is one point, and hurts the other team for 10 HP. 
10 ducks for each team and the ducks speed up after each kill, but watch out because you don't want to
shoot your own ducks. CT must shoot the RED ducks, and T must shoot the BLUE ducks.
Each player is given a shotgun.

Juggernaut

In this mini game each player starts out with 200 HP and 2 x speed. There are 4 juggernaut packages available
that give you 750 HP and the m249 machine gun, but there are draw backs to being the juggernaut, your
speed will be decreased dramatically compared to the other players. Along with the juggernaut packages there
are 6 health kits through out the map, but are other wise useless if your HP isn't below 100 because they
will only regenerate your health up to 100 HP. Each player is given a deagle after spawn, in front of your spawn
I have placed 25 m4a1 rifles, if you want a different weapon you must find it within the map.

Foosball

Table soccer, table football, foosball, call it what you will but it is what it is. This map is limited up to 28 players,
14 players on each, so if your server is holding more than 28 players at that time its first come first serve.
Each player can move from left to right on the field and kick back and forth. Your team must score 3 points to win.
Each point scored will award your team one point. If the ball gets stuck somewhere just press the button with the white
podium and it will reset the ball. The ball drops into the middle and is kicked out in a random direction. Pick a player by pressing your
USE button on one of the player podiums, press Use or jump to exit your players UI.
I would like to thank Devieus from the GameBanana community for making foosball possible. without him we wouldn't have a ball to kick around.
FOOSBALL CONTROLS
W & S moves the player from left to right.
A & D kicks the ball back and forth. if your confused on which goal to aim for, just kick forward.
Left Mouse Button - Hold this to get a better view of your player, it will track your players movement.
Right Mouse Button - Hold this to get a better view of the field, it will track the ball. 

Stand Off

This is a 1 on 1 match using deagles. After entering the arena each player will be given a deagle at the same time.
After your opponent dies your weapon will be taken away to make it fair for the next player entering the arena.
Your health will be regenerated if your get hurt so the next player doesn't have an advantage.

Scoutknives

Last but not least, scoutknives. This shouldn't need any explaining.
